Package main.java.model

Class Player

java.lang.Object
main.java.model.Player
public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
Player is an abstract class that handles the player's paddle in game.

  • Constructor Details

    • Player

      public Player​(java.awt.Point ballPoint, int height, java.awt.Rectangle container)
      Constructor of Player class initialize and set value for ballpoint, moveAmount, playerFace, min, max
      Parameters:
      ballPoint - Position of the ball (which is always the startPoint (300, 430))
      height - Height of player paddle
      container - Rectangle GameFrame where game is rendered/drawn

  • Method Details

      returns True if ball impacted player paddle (ball's downside impacted player bar)
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      boolean True or False
